conference: SIGKDD Conference on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining
notes: Included only research track papers. Authors were strongly encouraged to share their data and code for reproducibility. All papers had a meta-review by SPC member, and 96%+ had at least 4 reviews. The best reviewer award went to Karthik Raman, Kevin Small, Zoran Obradovic, and Pauli Miettinen
